meanings.definition: A body of water partially enclosed by land
meanings.sent1: The bay sparkled under the sun's rays.
meanings.sent2: We went fishing in the bay last weekend.
meanings.sent3: The bay seemed to wink at us as we sailed by.
meanings.sent4: The bay was a tranquil oasis amidst the bustling city.
meanings.sent5: The bay's beauty took our breath away.

meanings.definition: A section of a building that is set back from the main part
meanings.sent1: The cozy reading nook was located in the bay of the house.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed sitting in the bay window and watching the rain.
meanings.sent3: The bay provided a perfect spot for a small home office.
meanings.sent4: The bay offered a peaceful retreat from the noise of the street.
meanings.sent5: The bay window framed a picturesque view of the garden.

meanings.sent1: The dog would bay at the moon every night.
meanings.sent2: The hound bayed in excitement as it chased after the squirrel.
meanings.sent3: The howling wind seemed to bay along with the dog.
meanings.sent4: The baying of the hound echoed through the forest.
meanings.sent5: The sound of baying dogs filled the night air.
